titles.title: Health Care Access Improvement Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to primary health service providers who establish practices in health professional shortage areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/20/2007--Introduced. Health Care Access Improvement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a primary health service provider (i.e., a physician, clinical psychologist, or clinical social worker) a tax credit for the value of professional services provided to individuals in a health professional shortage area.
